Title: Wpf Like WinRT
Description: A simply and fast Mvvm Library for Wpf with Navigation and UI like WinRT.
HomeWiki:
Wpf Like WinRT

A Library for WPF with Navigation, UI Composition and helpers for Mvvm Pattern.

Download from CodePlex or install using NuGet


Navigation

  • View To View
  • View To ViewModel
  • ViewModel To ViewModel
And UI composition with regions and history.

Mvvm

  • Messenger : with token, callback, etc.
  • Commands and composite command.
  • ServiceLocator : Easy IoC container. Implementing IServiceLocator (Microsoft.Practices.ServiceLocation) .
  • ViewModelBase : the base class for ViewModels. Implementing navigation.
  • Observables (notification, cancellation and validation)
  • Etc.

You can use this namespace in your projects :
xmlns:wlw=http://www.codeplex.com/wpflikewinrt
